***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [wasa]
**** Noun[edit] ****
वासा • (wāsā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐰𑐵𑐳𑐵)
   1. plough
***** Pali[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
Alternative forms
    * vāsā (Latin script)
    * 𑀯𑀸𑀲𑀸 (Brahmi script)
    * ৰাসা (Bengali script)
    * වාසා (Sinhalese script)
    * ဝါသာ or ဝႃသႃ (Burmese script)
    * วาสา (Thai script)
    * ᩅᩤᩈᩣ (Tai Tham script)
    * ວາສາ (Lao script)
    * វាសា (Khmer script)
    * 𑅇𑄂𑄥𑄂 (Chakma script)
**** Noun[edit] ****
वासा (vāsā)
   1. Devanagari_script form of vāsā, which is inflection of वास:
         1. ablative singular
         2. nominative/vocative plural (vāsa)
